channel.title: Couple things I need/need help with
channel.description:
Ok here's the things I need to make my server complete!! Some may be hard... Anyways Thanks for helping here's the list
1. How to add quests (Like original runescapes)
2. A Good Shops.cfg (one based on runescape NOT 508 or 503 and if there's some rares Ill delete myself)
3. How to add emotes?
4. A good client (not 508 or 503 i think the update before it Im not sure but im using galkons base I NEED ONE WITH NOO NULLS OR VERY FEW NULLS)
5. A fullscreen client? (again not 508 or 503)
6. Original pk spots? (mine is pretty much pk every where and i want it so it's like runescapes)
6 1/2. how to release a client?
7. TYVM!!! FOR HELPING
[b]yes I've searched these multiple times so please don't flame or anything and THANKS A LOT FOR HELPING.[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2008, 02:29:18 pm[/size][hr]anyonee??
